about.title: About Nuna Gom
about.subtitle: Warmth in Every Loop
about.p1: Nuna Gom started with a simple love for knitting and the comfort found in handmade warmth. 'Nuna' means 'Sister' in Korean, and 'Gom' means 'Bear'. It represents the reliable and cozy feeling of a handmade gift from a loved one.
about.p2: Each bear is crafted individually, taking 5-7 days to complete. We don't rush the process because we believe that the time spent knitting is part of the gift itself.
about.p3: We hope our bears bring a smile to your face and warmth to your heart.
about.signature: With love, The Nuna Gom Team

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we handle your personal information.
privacy.collect_desc: We collect information you provide directly to us when you place an order or send an inquiry. This includes your name, phone number, address, and any messages.
privacy.use_desc: We use your information strictly to fulfill your orders and respond to your inquiries. We do not share your information with third parties except for shipping partners to deliver your order.

shipping.title: Shipping & Returns
shipping_desc: We ship all orders via traceable courier service.
Standard shipping fee is 3,000 KRW. Free shipping on orders over 100,000 KRW.
• Ready-made items: Dispatched within 1-2 business days.
• Made-to-order items: Please allow 5-10 business days for crafting before dispatch.
return_desc: Due to the handmade nature of our products, we generally do not accept returns unless the item is defective.
If you receive a defective item, please contact us within 3 days of receipt.
Custom-made items cannot be returned or exchanged.
